name: Maneesha
greetingText: On this special day, celebrating the wonderful you!
wishText: May your day be filled with joy and laughter!
text1: Cheers to your special day, dear friend! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, Maneesha! Many, many joyful moments...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realized I wanted to do something
outroText: May this day bring countless smiles to your face.
replayText: Or click if you want to watch it again.
